name: Sexy puzzle
detailed_description:
Take part in a social experiment, check yourself, whether you can think and solve brain-puzzles at the moment when sexy girls distract you with their sexy dances.

Sexy puzzle is an addictive tetris style game. The goal is to drag pieces to board and fill up all grids. It comes with different difficulties ranging from beginner to expert, a lot of levels, and also, it comes with many sexy girls who will do their best to distract you from your goal.

Key features:

  • - sexy girls dancing non-stop ;)
  • - 4 difficulties ranging from Beginner to Expert
  • - 240 interesting levels
  • - The most simple gameplay: drag & drop!
  • - Stuck? Just use the hint button
  • - Stunning, colorful graphics & themes for pure enjoyment!

Benefits of Sexy Puzzle game:

  • - helps you relieve stress
  • - helps you improve your brain
  • - is the relaxing fun you need
  • - is the only game that's also a brain workout
  • - play before you go to sleep for better dreams ;)
  • - its fun and good for you!

short_description: Take part in a social experiment, check yourself, whether you can think and solve brain-puzzles at the moment when sexy girls distract you with their sexy dances

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8 or later
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz processor or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX compatible video card with at least 128 VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.5 or later
  • Processor: Intel 1.2 GHz processor or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible video card with at least 128 VRAM
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 LTS (or similar, Debian-based distro)
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible video card
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes: There are dancing sexy dressed girls at all pages of the game.
